name: Fallen Legion+
description: Fallen Legion is an intense action RPG where every battle is a heart-pounding fight and each gut-wrenching choice impacts the realm.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 10/8.1/7 (64-bit) 处理器: Intel Core i3-4170 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 存储空间: 需要 2 GB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows 10/8.1/7 处理器: Intel Core i5-4690K 内存: 8 GB RAM 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 存储空间: 需要 2 GB 可用空间
